title: Stuck on Step 2 - Purchasing RP
body: Have been waiting for almost 45 minutes now for the payment to process, would it be safe to retry?

replies.body: It would be really strange to have to wait that long for a payment to process, so there might be something going on.  You could retry if you like, but you can also reach out to us in a[ support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)to take a look into this.  Our billing team can help out with whatever is preventing a purchase.  We'll respond asap!
